main.se450.observable

Class Shield

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.se450.observable.AbstractObserver
      • main.se450.observable.Shield
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObservable

    public class Shield
extends AbstractObserver
implements IObservable
    The Class Shield represents the observer for the shield event.
